title: Witch Moon
description: Across an ocean the portal village of Drakauragh suffers under dark magic and vengeful gods. An ancient terror threatens our world once again. If the rising darkness has its way, the light of day will fail.A plea has been sent to the Monster Hunters of Hunter's Grove. Hope is dim.These are dark times indeed. The light is fading.The Witch Moon rises.
author: D.C. McGannon
